Instruction: Simmer spinach in 1/4 cup of water in a saucepan. Cover and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Slowly sauté onions in butter over medium heat in a medium saucepan until tender.
Bake the mixture of spinach, onion, crabmeat, Parmesan cheese, and dry sherry in a small baking dish in the preheated oven for about 15 minutes until bubbly and lightly browned.
